name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering robust, cloud-native applications. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Helm**, with a strong focus on Continuous Delivery and security analysis. Demonstrated expertise in monitoring and logging using **ELK** and **Grafana**. Skilled in collaborative environments and effective communication in English.

As a Full Stack Developer, I bring extensive knowledge in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in developing scalable systems using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms, implementing microservices, and establishing CI/CD pipelines, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, covering model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
